name: microprediction-logger
description: A logger of stream data from Microprediction.org

scripts.build-dist: rm -rf dist dist.zip && webpack --config webpack.config.js && zip -r dist.zip dist/
scripts.build: npm run build-dist && aws s3 cp dist.zip s3://microprediction-lambda/logger.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name stream-logger --s3-bucket microprediction-lambda --s3-key logger.zip --publish

author: Rusty Conover <rusty@conover.me>
